location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'A Map of Turkestan illustrating the travels of Arminius Vamberry in 1863'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:351 x 660 mm; on sheet 393 x 687 mmFoliation:The map sheet has been foliated in the front top right hand corner of the folio with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Imprint:London, published by John Murray, Albermarle Street. Lithographed by Stanfords Geog. Estab.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Shows the route of the author by red line.The verso of the folio contains the title 'Vamberry's map of Central Asia' written in Lewis Pelly's handwriting in pencil.
